summary: Adds Ingun as a companion/marriage candidate while giving her some extra abilities and perks.
descriptionHtml:
Heya!

This mod makes Ingun marriageable and enables her to be a follower. She levels with the PC and has extra abilities and perks that I thought would help bring her more to life as a follower. You will have to start a new game to get here to be updated, (I think) I\'m sorry :<

Her abilities are as follows:

Kryptonite:
Being an alchemist has allowed her to figure out any creature or mans weakness to use against them. Kryptonite is her breakthrough that will harness the weaknesses of the enemy allowing for more magic and armor penetration. 
-This spell has 5 levels and will (hopefully) level with her and the PC. 

Down Poison:
While being an alchemist gives her knowledge on many plants and creatures it often means having to acquire dangerous and often poisonous ingredients. Putting these to good use she has a passive to occasionally poison whoever she is attacking.
-This levels with her alchemy skill. It has five levels each level will apply a stronger poison with a greater chance of doing so.

Live For Today:
Every so often while exploring she way be mortally wounded! To compensate for that she has developed a remedy. 
-This is a small AOE healing spell that she should use if she takes too much damage.
(In this she is set to essential, however she still bleeds out)

Citizen/Soldier:
Being from the Black-Briar means something. She will gain a small boost in one handed while in combat.
-Just a passive

------------------------
Her skill set-up is one-handed/light armor/destruction/restoration
She also levels up her alchemy just for some realism.
She has a couple of other spells which include icesphere/vampire drain/chainlightning
To marry her or to make her follow you, you have to do her quest. 
------------------------

Bugs?!

So far I\'m unaware of anything, I\'ve only played it for about an hour and thought it was working well. The only thing I notice is that she is VERY reluctant on using Kryptonite. I\'m fiddling with her combat AI to try and find one that fits...better.

Conflicts/Resolutions

This will most likely conflict with any other mod that changes Ingun. 

Inspiration!

I really enjoyed having Ingun as a vampire companion:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2710
I thought about keeping her a vampire since that\'s how I played her, but I\'m unsure so it might change in future versions, but thanks to this mod I fell in love with Ingun as a follower. Because of that! Check her inventory for a special surprise.

Also I got the idea to make custom perks/abilities from~!
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7245
Great ideas in that one!
author: Nekocatz
